TopicTitle: craft explodes at ~100 meters above the ocean, moving at 4.8 meters per second

Articles.Content: the parachute had deployed, and i was in  x4 physics warp. I am using grannus exploration pack. all I could find was a single decoupler. there were no decouplers on my craft.

One problem that I've had while playing KSP is that when using physics warp, my craft shakes itself to pieces. Have you tried replicating the mission and not using any level of physics warp (other than 1x)?

On 11/18/2020 at 11:50 AM, KerbalKiller2000 said:

One problem that I've had while playing KSP is that when using physics warp, my craft shakes itself to pieces. Have you tried replicating the mission and not using any level of physics warp (other than 1x)?

it wasn't shaking, it just randomly exploded
A video would be useful here.
